data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Dhemaji with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dhemaji, Assam, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Dhemaji, Assam, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the county of Dhemaji prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Dhemaji.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Chepang people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Dhemaji to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the county of Dhemaji against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who are far from you in Dhemaji. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

location.name: Dhemaji
location.people_groups_list: Assamese (Muslim traditions), Bhunar, Mahara, Ganak, Koch (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Assamese (Muslim traditions) (2,691,000), Bhunar (200), Mahara (4,800), Ganak (300), Koch (Hindu traditions) (50,000)
